text: is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Taiyō Matsumoto about table tennis. It was serialized in Shogakukan's seinen manga magazine Big Comic Spirits from 1996 to 1997 and collected in five tankōbon volumes. == References == Category:1996 manga Category:2000s comedy-drama movies Category:2000s sports movies Category:2000s teen movies Category:2014 anime television series Category:Anime series based on manga Category:Japanese drama movies Category:Manga series Category:Sports comedy movies Category:Table tennis
title: Ping Pong (manga)
